name: Rogue Warrior
description: Rogue Warrior is a character-driven, first-person-shooter, featuring Richard 'Demo Dick' Marcinko's explosive personality in an action-packed single player campaign, and intense multiplayer combat. Playing as Richard 'Demo Dick' Marcinko, you go behind the iron curtain to disrupt a suspected North Korean ballistic missile program.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista Processor: 3.4 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or equivalent processor Memory: 1 GB RAM (XP)/ 2 GB RAM (Vista) Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compliant video card with 256 MB RAM (NVIDIA 7900 or better, ATI X1800 or better)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6400 or equivalent processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compliant video card with 512 MB RAM (NVIDIA 8800 series, ATI HD2900 PRO or better)

reviews.review_text: This game is great, if you hate yourself.
This is probably one of my favorite terrible games.

[0/10]  This is it ! this is the game you must play before you die. you gotta try, you gotta try ! the worst game I have ever played in my entire life. and don't worry. it'll only take you about one and half hour to complete this piece of ♥♥♥♥.  Can't believe someone really spend 50 bucks to pre-order this crap.

Old ♥♥♥♥in' Men  Running the ♥♥♥♥in' World.   A NEW ♥♥♥♥IN' AGE.   Lemme tell you, this main character is having one bad day.  It's like Max Payne being a Navy Seal about to retire and got his pottymouth cranked up to 11.   Oh but the game is poorly made and is one of the lowest rated fps game of all time (not the lowest but...it's pretty down there, man.)
Call of Duty should be jealous, a new level of ♥♥♥♥♥ines has been reached ...

Bethesda markets Rogue Warrior as a “character-driven first person shooter”, which is stretching the definition of character slightly. The game takes place in 1986, where North Koreans and Russians are doing sinister weapons research. This calls for our hero called ♥♥♥♥, who is ready to stop them, armed with an enormous amount of lovely one-liners like “♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ ♥♥♥♥-breath commie ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥s”. It’s like poetry.  This game is only slightly better than the very worst a game can be. The music sounds like it’s from a free music library, but probably isn’t, while the graphics and audio also only meet the quality standard of free template assets. You know you’re in trouble when something as simple as “walking forward” feels bad.   To the game’s credit, it only took me 109 minutes to complete. I was in the mood to play something that was total ♥♥♥♥, and it certainly delivered exactly what I was hoping for. If you’re going to make a garbage game, this is the level you should aspire to hit at a minimum. I wasn’t bored by it, and it had the decency to end early. It also didn’t feel like some crap thrown together at random.   They tried to make something coherent here, something that resembled a real game. But they didn’t have the means, talent or maybe even the will to make that happen. There’s a reason this game is consistently brought up as a legendary piece of crap 7 years after it came out, while thousands of other bad games are forgotten. It’s hard to put my finger on just what makes this memorable, but it’s the “right” kind of bad to leave an impression, which many mediocre games don’t. Maybe it’s simply the one-liners.

This has gotta be one of the worst games I've ever played.  Although it has it's charms considering all the profanity it uses. ^^ But that's pretty much all it is about, quickkilling enemies with the press of a button and swearing. But it's all so sloppy done by the developers, there's absolutely no finish to this game at all. Mickey Rourke does an okey enough job with his voice-performance since everything else is sub-par it fits pretty well.  The guns have no feel to them what so ever. Covermechanics are so basic, it feels like a ten year old game... wait, it IS a ten year old game, say 15 years then. It's nowhere near what Gears of War delivers. The AI is very straight forward. Literally, if you're standing right next to them, they won't see you. Unless your right in front of them. Simple enough to stay out of sight if you wish it. For 2,5€, sure. It's somewhat entertaining in it's own way. You will sure as hell laugh a lot. =)  2/10 (It get's a 2, because it IS stable, haven't experienced any crashes on my machine, the game has som issues where ragdoll and AI and such can break a bit, but then again what game doesen't have that?) It's still better than Aliens: Colonial Marines ^^
This game is funy, especially those who grew up in the cold war time. Lovely game play as well.
Only reason I own this title is because it came with a package deal. The game itself is cheezy and dumb. Would rather play an old 16bit version of duke nukem than this garbage.
Completing this game on easy AND HARD took under 3 hours... WTF? Can't even say I had much fun in that short while either.
Reminds me of a James Bond game I used to play a long time ago. Its not the best game every made but I think its worth the money if its on sale.
Could a game honestly be any more ♥♥♥♥ than this pile of ♥♥♥? I can seriously think of nothing worse than this dull bland pile of nothing special crap.
This game gave me cancer.

Top 5 things you could do with the money you would spend on this game: 1. Get a double double animal style with animal style fries and a vanilla shake at an In N Out 2. Get 2 $5 foot longs at a Subway. 3. Wipe your butt with a $10 bill 4. Light a $10 bill on fire 5. Not spend $10  Seriously, just don't buy this game and watch other people play it and complain about it.
Gave me syphilis 0/10.
1/10 for no character no immersive story same gameplay
Hilariously bad. 2 hours to beat. Plays like an N64 game

A fun but basic and extremely short first person shooter. The game is silly and nothing is above average in terms of its gameplay. The game is also extremely short so do not even think about buying this game for any larger amount of money. With that said i had some fun with it and you will probably too as long as you keep your expectations to the minimum. THe game had some severe screen tearing problems by the way.
mickey rourke goes full faulkner with lots of sound and fury

Is the game ♥♥♥♥? You betcha. But its the mindless ♥♥♥♥ like Duke Nukem.  I had more fun with this game than games llike Deadlight which I just beat before playing this. It took a little less than 2 hours for me to finish this game from start to finish. I actually think the legnth helped it as it would have gotten old if it had drug on for much longer.  If you can pick this up for 1 or 2 bucks then go for it. Just turn your brain off and have a good time.
Dont waste your money. The game will not always play right and the Support Teams fix was for us to sell the game on Ebay.(I bought the game on Disk when it came out.)
This game is so bad, it's good.
Cursing Simulator 2009! Bland combat, bland story, and knife your way to victory! At least the game was only 2 hours long. 4/20 would skip, but watch youtube videos of it.
I bought this for 2 bucks thinking 'oh it can't be that bad'  It is that bad   Stay Away.
bit easy but very enjoyable, a game you can pick up anytime for some action-movie type play and swearing lol....love the kill-moves :)

Liked the game play, graphics and story. Game is much to short for the 50 bucks. Played it within an hour or so. Multiplayer game lame since nobody is online any more to play with.  But i like to see a second out come of this game. Luckely i did'nt pay the full new price but bought it on sale cost me 5 euro's money wel spend.  The voice of the character played by Mickey Rourke very plesant. I like this acteurs voice in the game.

This is an awful shooter. Graphics are straight out of a 2000 style shooter - think of it as being along the lines of the Original Soldier of Fortune. If this had been a 2000 title, much of it could be forgiven, but it was released in 2009.   Weapons and Grenades are awful. Trying to use the melee system is awful as the game must stop to show a cut scene - too late if the guy cries out to alert his friends.   Exploding barrels are everywhere to shoot at, ammo for your starting weapons is almost non-existant meaning you will be swapping out weapons. You have two weapons slots so choose your weapons carefully. No, nevermind, just take the guns you can get ammo for.  Some weapons just seem to randomly show up. Meh!  Don't spend more than $5. It has some good ideas that are cliche, but this game coming out in 2009 and already being dated - pass it up.  Mickey Rourke's voice acting is just about the only saving grace this game has. If you've read all of Marcinkos Rogue Warrior books, then you'll already be familiar with the cursing. An no, Marcinko's real voice does not sound like Mickey Rourke.

sometimes i play fps games to enjoy a storyline, or to play competitively. and the other times, i play rogue warrior.   got this from humble bundle, paid a dollar for this, along with other games. was it worth? totally.   i play this game mindlessly. theres no storyline. AI is dumber than ♥♥♥♥. all you do is run towards people and knife them while swearing for no reason (because protagonist is hardcore!) playing this game is like going in my zen mode because you don't have to do any thinking while playing

Clunky FPS with more cussing than Wallstreet. This game attempts to add realism by having it's protagonist respond to enemies by cussing them out... constantly. It wasn't worth the download time and I cringe when I see it on my list of games. I should have read the reviews. Oh, well.

Imagine if Goldeneye had been made in 2002 for the PS2. That's Rogue Warrior.   Don't knock it. A dumb shooter game with a few stealth elements tacked on. Enjoy it for what it is, and don't compare it to what it's not. You'd be amazed how much fun it is to have a game that doesn't even pretend to be clever. You shoot at the bad mans, the bad mans fall over, your character says tough guy things.   A nice reminder that a game doesn't have to have to try to be more than a dumb shooter to be fun.

Most hilariously bad FPS I've ever played. Hideous graphics, screen tearing, brain dead AI, constant 4 second game freezes and a campaign that's 2hrs long. However, Mickey Rourke's lines push this over the top into pure schlock territory. If he wasn't in this game, then it would literally have no redeeming value.  If you can find this on sale for $1, then definately buy it just to have a laugh that Bethesda actually saw fit to release this glorious trash.

this one of the few so bad it's good games out there.  Nonsensical swearing is what really makes it,and its just competent enough to not be frustrating and short enough that it doesnt overstay its welcome.    protip: you don't have to crouch or walk to get a stealth kill.
